nodes.text:
Well, you made it. You survived so far.##

Thank you for playing this early access version of Kriss' Journey.#
I hope you enjoyed it so far and look forward to your feedback!#
Find us on the Community Page, Discord and GitHub!#
If you want to support this game, please consider leaving a review,
sharing the game with your friends,
and donating.#

Thank you for your support, traveler!#

And stay tuned for more content coming soon!#
